Max Fowler
code, art, design

Read his bio, see his portfolio or send him an email. Currently based in Brooklyn and available for contracting.

Here are some of my past projects:
oasis
a virtual reality commune only acessible by SSH
2 pots
a series of generative lines drawings exploring controlled noise
abridgedmaps.com
a website that strips Google Maps of all natural imagery to reveal concrete poems about the structure of contemporary space
truespeak
a thought experiment and functional app that allows you to upload conversations from your text message history to a publicly viewable page on the internet
howdoispeak
a website which shows you insights about the way you text by analyzing the frequency of your word usage in your text messages over time
the capitalist t-shirt
an e-commerce store which sells t-shirts, framed prints and booty shorts
brocascoconut.com
the landing page for a pseudo-anonymous mailing list
css sketchbook
a working sketchbook I've been using to work through the exercises in the book "The Secrets Of CSS"
Follow me on twitter, github, are.na, or send me an email
